modName: Thalmor only use Elven Weapons and Armor
summary: Thalmor will now only use Elven weapons and armor.
descriptionHtml:
I always found it odd that the Thalmor would boast about Elven superiority over Man but they wouldn\\\'t use their own weapons until latter on in the game. They would use Elven armor but they wouldn\\\'t use Elven weapons until you reached the appropriate level. This mod changes that. This mod makes it to where the Thalmor will only use Elven weapons. 

[b]Update[/b]
1.1 The Thalmor at Northwatch keep and the Embassy should now be affected by this mod. 

[b]Please note that existing Thalmor in your area may not be effected by this mod right away.  You may need to fast travel for this to work. but newly spawned Thalmor should be effected by this right away. [/b]

There are four version for this mod. 

[b]Thalmor, only use elven weapons & armor IW:[/b] Removes both the steel and glass weapons and the glass armor. Requires Immersive Weapons.  http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27644//?

[b]Thalmor only use elven weapons & armor:[/b] Removes both the steel and glass weapons and the glass armor. But doesn\\\'t need Immersive Weapons.

[b]Thalmor no steel weapons IW:[/b] Removes only the steel weapons from the level list. Glass weapons and armor will still appear in their level list when the appropriate level is reached. Requires Immersive Weapons. http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27644//?

[b]Thalmor, no steel weapons:[/b]  Removes only the steel weapons from the level list. Glass weapons and armor will still appear in their level list when the appropriate level is reached.


[b]Q&A[/b]

Q: I ran into some Thalmor that were still using low level weapon (iron, steel, ect)

A: Please report the location of the Thalmor and I will investigate. 

Q: I\\\'m using a mod that adds more weapons to the Thalmor level list, can you make this compatible? 

A: Maybe. Send me the link to the mod and I will see what I can do. 

[b]Credit[/b]
I would like to thank hothtrooper44 for creating one of the best weapon collection mods (Immersive Weapons) I\'ve used. Without that mod, this mod would only probably be for the vanilla game. And who wants that, right? You can download his mod Immersive Weapons here http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27644//?
author: Force70
